title: ResourceExhaustedError (see above for traceback): OOM when allocating tensor
body:
Training time error occurs seems DLC runs out of memory. I tried to get it to work on 3 different computers (that all previously ran DLC without problem) including a machine with a Titan XP (12GB) of ram. I also had another open issue related to unconnected body parts. Perhaps this crash occurs because of that as well, but not clear. **Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):** - OS: Ubuntu 18.04 - DeepLabCut Version: 2.26b
